mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, order_num, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT ID.level level, DATA.id id, DATA.name name, DATA.parent_id parentId, DATA.order_num orderNum, DATA.create_by createBy, DATA.create_time createTime, DATA.last_update_by lastUpdateBy , DATA.last_update_time lastUpdateTime FROM( SELECT @ids as _ids, ( SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM sys_dept WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @ids) ) as cids, @l := @l+1 as level FROM sys_dept, (SELECT @ids :=#{parentId}, @l := 0 ) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL ) id, sys_dept DATA WHERE FIND_IN_SET(DATA.id, ID._ids) and DATA.parent_id <> 0 and DATA.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY level, id
